title: So far what topics have been covered in each subject in CSE stream? Particularly in chem cycle (my name starts with A so I assume I'm in that cycle).
content: I am waiting for kcet 2nd extended round results and I need to know what has been done so far, assuming I join pes this year.

comments.body:
In chem cycle we have : 
1. Engineering chemistry - molecular spectroscopy (more than half done)
2. Engineering mathematics - partial differentiation
3. Engineering Mechanics - Till Vectors
4. Electronic principles and devices - till v/i characteristics of a diode
5. Computational problem solving using python - Till smtg idk
6. Constitution of India and cyber laws - Unit 1 is done (3 more left)
ok thanks, but could you tell me all the topics done in mechanics and electronics

I can't tell the topics taught in mech even if I want to. I really don't know what's being taught. He just makes us solve some random problems in resolving force.

Epd semiconductors unit is being taught. In that we just finished v/i characteristics of a diode and now we are solving circuit problems consisting of diodes.
KCET R2 batch started on Sep 14 and very little has been covered so far
Evn im waiting for the extended round.....can anyone share the clg syllabus
It doesn't matter whether or not your name starts with an A , you will be alloted in an entirely different section with the rest of the kcet students
Check pes media server, search in pes official website. you will get
dude you got admission thru 2nd round right? what documents do you need to submit to the college?
I got seat in R1 but accepted and joined in R2.Pes website has list of docs- marks cards, Transfer certificate Admission order, fee paid reciept, Aadhar, 4 photos(passport and stamp size)
